
C2
Verses in the Book of 1 Corinthians That Contain the Name Jehovah as Part of Direct or Indirect Quotations




VERSE

QUOTE OR REFERENCE

SUPPORTING REFERENCES



1 CORINTHIANS 1:31

Jeremiah 9:24

J7, 8, 10-12, 14, 16-18, 22-24, 28, 29, 32-35, 41-43, 47, 52, 54, 57, 59, 60, 65, 66, 74, 88, 90, 93-96, 100-102, 106, 114, 115, 117, 122, 133, 136, 138, 144-147, 149, 164-166, 187, 201, 228, 236, 244, 279, 283, 290, 295, 297


1 CORINTHIANS 2:16

Isaiah 40:13

J14, 16-18, 22-24, 28-35, 38, 40, 42, 43, 47, 52, 54, 57, 59-61, 65, 66, 74, 88, 90, 93-96, 99, 100-102, 114, 115, 117, 122, 125, 130, 133, 136, 138, 144, 146, 149, 178, 201, 236, 244, 265, 271, 273, 283, 290, 295


1 CORINTHIANS 3:20

Psalm 94:11

J7, 8, 10-12, 14, 16-18, 20, 22-24, 28-35, 38, 40-43, 46, 47, 54, 57, 59-61, 65, 66, 74, 88, 90, 93-96, 100-102, 105, 106, 114, 115, 117, 118, 130, 136, 144-147, 149, 154, 166, 167, 178, 187, 201, 203, 209, 210, 212, 217, 227, 228, 236, 244, 250, 265, 269, 271, 273, 279, 283, 287, 290, 295, 300


1 CORINTHIANS 10:26

Psalm 24:1

J7, 8, 10, 11, 14, 16-18, 20, 22, 23, 28-35, 41-43, 46, 47, 54, 57, 59, 61, 65, 66, 74, 88, 90, 93-96, 100-102, 114, 115, 125, 129, 130, 136, 144-147, 164-167, 170, 171, 178, 201, 203, 209, 210, 228, 236, 244, 250, 265, 271, 273, 275, 283, 287, 290, 294
